featured.text: For example, when the riders scan the band at the Off-Road Adventure, a photo will be taken and sent to their email.
The rides are custom- designed to accommodate wheelchair riders so that every family member can enjoy the fun.

definition.zh_def: 騎乘者，特別是騎馬或騎自行車的人。
definition.en_def: A person who rides, especially on a horse or bicycle.
definition.example: The rider skillfully maneuvered the horse through the obstacle course.
